name: Shortest Trip to Earth
description: Shortest Trip to Earth is a roguelike spaceship simulator focused on exploration, ship management and tactical battles. Embark on a perilous journey across the universe, while an intergalactic war is raging.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Microsoft Windows 7, 8, 10 - 64 bit Processor: Intel Core i3 or equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD4400 or dedicated DX11 GPU (1280x720) DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Microsoft Windows 10 - 64 bit Processor: Intel Core i5 or equivalent Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 1050 (1920x1080) DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space
